ttp_template:
<group name="name_descr">
NAME: "{{NAME | ORPHRASE}}", DESCR: "{{DESCR | ORPHRASE}}"
</group>
<group name="pid_vid_sn">
PID: {{PID}} , VID: {{VID}}, SN: {{SN | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
NAME: "3640 chassis", DESCR: "3640 chassis"
PID:                   , VID: 0xFF, SN: FF1045C5

NAME: "One port Fastethernet TX", DESCR: "One port Fastethernet TX"
PID: NM-1FE-TX=        , VID: 1.0, SN: 7720321

NAME: "One port Fastethernet TX", DESCR: "One port Fastethernet TX"
PID: NM-1FE-TX=        , VID: 1.0, SN: 7720321

NAME: "One port Fastethernet TX", DESCR: "One port Fastethernet TX"
PID: NM-1FE-TX=        , VID: 1.0, SN: 7720321
textfsm_template:
Value NAME (.*)
Value DESCR (.*)
Value PID (([\S+]+|.*))
Value VID (.*)
Value SN ([\w+\d+]+)

Start
  ^NAME:\s+"${NAME}",\s+DESCR:\s+"${DESCR}"
  ^PID:\s+${PID}.*,.*VID:\s+${VID},.*SN:\s+${SN} -> Record
  ^PID:\s+,.*VID:\s+${VID},.*SN: -> Record
  ^PID:\s+${PID}.*,.*VID:\s+${VID},.*SN: -> Record
  ^PID:\s+,.*VID:\s+${VID},.*SN:\s+${SN} -> Record
  ^PID:\s+${PID}.*,.*VID:\s+${VID}.*
  ^PID:\s+,.*VID:\s+${VID}.*
  ^.*SN:\s+${SN} -> Record
  ^.*SN: -> Record
  # Capture time-stamp if vty line has command time-stamping turned on
  ^Load\s+for\s+
  ^Time\s+source\s+is
